clearAllBordersRoutine.Note: Clears black borders on all guess squares

thenRoutine: var border = ${PROPERTY css OF $widgetID} replace 'border: 2px solid black' 'border: 2px solid white'

setBorderRoutine.Note: Set black border on given guess square

setBorderRoutine: var border = ${PROPERTY css OF $square} replace 'border: 2px solid white' 'border: 2px solid black'

clearAllAlphabetBordersRoutine.Note: Clears black borders on all alphabet squares

thenRoutine: var border = ${PROPERTY css OF $widgetID} replace 'border: 2px solid black' 'border: 2px solid white'

setAlphabetBorderRoutine.Note: Set black border on given alphabet square

setAlphabetBorderRoutine: var border = ${PROPERTY css OF $square} replace 'border: 2px solid white' 'border: 2px solid black'
functions.whiteCss: --wcMain:white; --wcMainOH:lightgray; color: black; font-family: Arial; font-size: 24pt; border: 2px solid white; border-radius:0
functions.notInWordCss: --wcMain:#ec7063; --wcMainOH:lightgray; color: black; font-family: Arial; font-size: 24pt; border: 2px solid white; border-radius:0
functions.inWordCss: --wcMain:#82e0aa; --wcMainOH:lightygray; color: black; font-family: Arial; font-size: 24pt; border: 2px solid white; border-radius:0
functions.guessedCss: --wcMain:gray; --wcMainOH:lightgray; color: black; font-family: Arial; font-size: 24pt; border: 2px solid white; border-radius:0

endGameRoutine.Note: Show all player panels, hide score panels
Make player panels visible to all

info.name: Find the Word
info.attribution: Room layout and background image by Roger Lipsett and released to the public domain (CC0).
info.description: Players secretly choose a 5-letter word. Opponents take turns guessing letters one at a time and to find out if letter is in the secret word and clues about its position. First to guess opponent's word wins.

clickRoutine.Note: Next 3 selects find all squares in guesses
clickRoutine.Note1: by the current player that contain this letter.

clickRoutine.Note: And then we set all those letters to new color.

restartGameRoutine.Note: and hide all game panels except
restartGameRoutine.Note1: word chooser and first move panel.
